name: ChronoCore
description:
**This game struggles a bit in the browser. If you have significant frame drops, downloads are available for every OS**

Something has gone terribly wrong in the bowels of your space station. The ChronoCore has breached and damaged the station's defensive security systems. Time fluctuations have become rampant, and it's your job as the engineer to solve the problem. So hop in your space craft and get to work already!

Controls:

  • WASD             - Movement
  • Left Click       - Shoot Bullets
  • Right Click    - Rewind Time
  • L Shift              - Stop Time
  • E                         - Drop Weapon

Shoot enemies and progress through the space station full of bad guys. Victory will not be had until every one of them is defeated!

Use your time manipulation abilities to aid you, but be wary, because if you use them too much you'll have to wait for them to re-charge.

Pick up the health and weapons that the enemy leaves behind, and use them to your advantage. There are worse machines in here than you might expect. If they don't leave any weapons behind, you can always rely on your ship's trusty single-shot cannon.

- Made by 84d92r and myself
